sourcesContent:
import { connect } from 'react-redux'
import {loadLoyaltyCard, fetchInitLoyaltyCard, loadCachedLoyaltyCard, loadLoyaltyCards, selectAndChangeCardId, loadLoyaltyCardsWithAnonymousUser, closeValidationModal} from '../../modules/home/actions'

import CardPage from '../../pages/CardPage'

const mapStateTopProps = (state) => {
  
  return {
    isLoadingCard: state.home.isLoadingCard,
    currentCard: state.home.currentCard,
    error: state.home.error,
    card:state.home.card,
    cards:state.home.cards,
    selectedCardIndex:state.home.selectedCardIndex,
    hasValue:state.home.hasValue,
    isValidationSucceed:state.home.isValidationSucceed,
    isValidationSucceedWithGift:state.home.isValidationSucceedWithGift
  }
}

const mapActionCreators = {
  loadLoyaltyCard,
  fetchInitLoyaltyCard,
  loadCachedLoyaltyCard,
  loadLoyaltyCards,
  selectAndChangeCardId,
  loadLoyaltyCardsWithAnonymousUser,
  closeValidationModal
}


export default connect(mapStateTopProps, mapActionCreators)(CardPage)
